caption.center: GARY M. NORTHINGTON, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS,

opinion.opinion_text:
COA: 225014, Ct of Claims: 98-017054-CM.
On order of the Court, the motion for reconsideration of this Court's order of October 30, 2000, is considered, and it is DENIED, because it does not appear that the order was entered erroneously.
